text: Hmm, is it true that CodeCov uses just the commit hash to determine branches? I worked on a change in a branch, which I pushed first and then pushed exactly the same commit to main, but the coverage for my main branch didn't update. Where would be the best place to open an issue? Ref: <https://codecov.io/gh/simeonschaub/DiffUtils.jl> (the latest commit it shows to the `docs` branch there should show up on the main branch as well)

text: If not, they'll tell you where to go I guess :smile:

text: Yeah in my experience they use the commit hash only
